title: Electrochemical performance and structural evolution of spray pyrolyzed Mn3O4 thin films in different aqueous electrolytes: effect of anions and cations
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29748-29762
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05426A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pramitha Adoor., Shreeganesh Subraya Hegde, Badekai Ramachandra Bhat, Sajan D. George, Raviprakash Yeenduguli
Storage performance of spray-pyrolyzed Mn3O4 electrode varied significantly with electrolytes and maximum specific capacitance was achieved in K2SO4. Phase transformation from Mn3O4 to MnO2 was observed with cycling, regardless of the electrolyte.
